metadata.title: amscan Bleeding Knife Headband Costume Accessory - One Size, Multicolor - 1 Pc.
features: PACKAGE INCLUDES : 1 plastic bleeding knife headband - fits most teens and adults
CREEPY : Bleeding knife headband features a flexible plastic headband with an attached plastic "bleeding" Knife — it's actually a clear, hollow plastic blade with fake blood inside
PERFECT FOR HALLOWEEN : Perfect for halloween parties, costume parties, or stage performances
HIGH-QUALITY MATERIALS : Made from high-quality materials that can withstand multiple uses
HANDY : Lightweight and handy for quick and easy party accessory use
description: Got a stabbing headache that Aspirin can't cure? Well, it's not because of our bleeding knife headband! Bleeding knife headband features a flexible plastic headband with an attached plastic "bleeding" Knife — it's actually a clear, hollow plastic blade with fake blood inside. Wearing it doesn't hurt, but it creates the illusion of pain!
